name: How to become more productive?
description: Working all the time can be boring. Somtimes you just need to take a break and eat a yummy banana. Who knows what's on the other side of the apple.

name: Mystery in the workplace!
description: Out of all the developers I would never expect David to be so cranked - what a sussy baka! What's the dig lately? Has he been clapping on us lately?
